definitions:
(transitive) to dye
tingersi i baffi ― to dye one's mustache

(transitive) to add color to; to color
tingersi le labbra col rossetto ― to color one's lips with lipstick
(transitive) (with di) to blot or stain (with) (a color)

(transitive with di) to take on a certain coloration (of); to turn (a color)
le foglie cominciano a tingersi di giallothe leaves are beginning to turn yellow

(transitive with di) to be tinged (with) (an emotion)
quel ricordo si tingeva di tristezzathat memory was tinged with sadness

(intransitive) (also with di) to dye one's hair (a particular color)
mi sono tinto di rossoI dyed my hair red
(intransitive) to put on makeup; to make oneself up
